name: Chocolatey
help: Chocolatey has the largest online registry of Windows packages. Chocolatey packages encapsulate everything required to manage a particular piece of software into one deployment artifact by wrapping installers, executables, zips, and/or scripts into a compiled package file.

tasks.help: Searches remote or local packages (alias for <c>list</c>).
Searches remote or local packages (alias for <c>search</c>).
Retrieves packages that are outdated. Similar to <c>upgrade all --noop</c>.

properties.name: Source
properties.help: The source to find the package(s) to install. Special sources include: ruby, webpi, cygwin, windowsfeatures, and python. To specify more than one source, pass it with a semi-colon separating the values (-e.g. "'source1;source2'"). Defaults to default feeds.

properties.name: Prerelease
properties.help: Include Prereleases? Defaults to false.

properties.name: IgnorePinned
properties.help: Ignore pinned packages. Defaults to false.

properties.name: IgnoreUnfound
properties.help: Ignore packages that are not found on the sources used (or the defaults). Overrides the default feature 'ignoreUnfoundPackagesOnUpgradeOutdated' set to 'False'.

properties.name: DisablePackageRepositoryOptimizations
properties.help: Do not use optimizations for reducing bandwidth with repository queries during package install/upgrade/outdated operations. Should not generally be used, unless a repository needs to support older methods of query. When disabled, this makes queries similar to the way they were done in Chocolatey v0.10.11 and before. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageRepositoryOptimizations' set to 'True'.

tasks.help: Packages up a nuspec to a compiled nupkg.

properties.name: PathToNuspec
properties.help: Path to nuspec

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The version you would like to insert into the package.

properties.name: OutputDirectory
properties.help: Specifies the directory for the created Chocolatey package file. If not specified, uses the current directory.

properties.name: Properties
properties.help: You can pass arbitrary property value pairs through to nuspecs. These will replace variables formatted as $property$ with the value passed.

properties.name: PathToNuGetPackage
properties.help: Path to Nuget package (.nupkg).

properties.name: Source
properties.help: The source we are pushing the package to. Use https://pus-h.chocolatey.org/ to push to community feed.

properties.name: ApiKey
properties.help: The api key for the source. If not specified (and not local file source), does a lookup. If not specified and one is not found for an https source, push will fail.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: The time to allow a package push to occur before timing out. Defaults to execution timeout 2700 seconds.

tasks.help: Generates files necessary for a chocolatey package from a template.

properties.name: AutomaticPackage
properties.help: Generate automatic package instead of normal. Defaults to false.

properties.name: TemplateName
properties.help: Use a named template in C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\templates\templatename instead of built-in template.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The required name of the package.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The version of the package.

properties.name: Maintainer
properties.help: The name of the maintainer.

properties.name: OutputDirectory
properties.help: Specifies the directory for the created Chocolatey package file. If not specified, uses the current directory.

properties.name: BuildInTemplate
properties.help: Use the original built-in template instead of any override.

properties.name: LocationOfBinary
properties.help: In Chocolatey for Business, file is used for auto-detection (native installer, zip, patch/upgrade file, or remote url to download first) to completely create a package with proper silent arguments! Can be 32-bit or 64-bit architecture.

properties.name: LocationOfBinary64
properties.help: Used when specifying both a 32-bit and a 64-bit file. Can be an installer or a zip, or remote url to download.

properties.name: UseOriginalFilesLocation
properties.help: When using file or url, use the original location in packaging.

properties.name: Checksum
properties.help: Checksum to verify File/Url with. Defaults to empty.

properties.name: Checksum64
properties.help: Checksum to verify File64/Url64 with. Defaults to empty.

properties.name: ChecksumType
properties.help: checksum type for File/Url (and optional separate 64-bit files when specifying both). Used in conjunction with Download Checksum and Download Checksum 64-bit. Available values are 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256' or 'sha512'. Defaults to 'sha256'.

properties.name: PauseOnError
properties.help: Pause when there is an error with creating the package.

properties.name: BuildPackage
properties.help: Attempt to compile the package after creating it.

properties.name: GenerateFromInstalledSoftware
properties.help: Generate packages from the installed software on a system (does not handle dependencies).

properties.name: GenerateForCommunity
properties.help: Generate the package for community use.

properties.name: RemoveArchitectureFromName
properties.help: Remove x86, x64, 64-bit, etc from the package id. Default setting is to remove architecture.

properties.name: IncludeArchitectureInName
properties.help: Leave x86, x64, 64-bit, etc as part of the package id. Default setting is to remove architecture.

properties.name: Properties
properties.help: You can pass arbitrary property value pairs through to templates. This really unlocks your ability to create packages automatically!

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Show debug messaging.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Show verbose messaging. Very verbose messaging, avoid using under normal circumstances.

commonTaskProperties.name: Trace
commonTaskProperties.help: Show trace messaging. Very, very verbose trace messaging. Avoid except when needing super low-level .NET Framework debugging. Available in 0.10.4+.

commonTaskProperties.name: NoColor
commonTaskProperties.help: Do not show colorization in logging output. This overrides the feature 'logWithoutColor', set to 'False'. Available in 0.10.9+.

commonTaskProperties.name: AcceptLicense
commonTaskProperties.help: Accept license dialogs automatically. Reserved for future use.

commonTaskProperties.name: Confirm
commonTaskProperties.help: Chooses affirmative answer instead of prompting. Implies --accept-license

commonTaskProperties.name: Force
commonTaskProperties.help: Force the behavior. Do not use force during normal operation - it subverts some of the smart behavior for commands.

commonTaskProperties.name: LimitOutput
commonTaskProperties.help: Limit the output to essential information

commonTaskProperties.name: CommandExecutionTimeout
commonTaskProperties.help: The time to allow a command to finish before timing out. Overrides the default execution timeout in the configuration of 2700 seconds.

commonTaskProperties.name: CacheLocation
commonTaskProperties.help: Location for download cache, defaults to %TEMP% or value in chocolatey.config file.

commonTaskProperties.name: AllowUnofficialBuild
commonTaskProperties.help: When not using the official build you must set this flag for choco to continue.

commonTaskProperties.name: FailOnStandardError
commonTaskProperties.help: Fail on standard error output (stderr), typically received when running external commands during install providers. This overrides the feature failOnStandardError.

commonTaskProperties.name: UseSystemPowerShell
commonTaskProperties.help: Execute PowerShell using an external process instead of the built-in PowerShell host. Should only be used when internal host is failing.

commonTaskProperties.name: DoNotShowProgress
commonTaskProperties.help: Do not show download progress percentages.

commonTaskProperties.name: Proxy
commonTaskProperties.help: Explicit proxy location. Overrides the default proxy location of ''.

commonTaskProperties.name: ProxyUserName
commonTaskProperties.help: Explicit proxy user (optional). Requires explicit proxy (`--proxy` or config setting). Overrides the default proxy user of ''.

commonTaskProperties.name: ProxyPassword
commonTaskProperties.help: Explicit proxy password (optional) to be used with username. Requires explicit proxy (`--proxy` or config setting) and user name. Overrides the default proxy password (encrypted in settings sif set).

commonTaskProperties.name: ProxyBypassList
commonTaskProperties.help: Comma separated list of regex locations to bypass on proxy. Requires explicit proxy (`--proxy` or config setting).

commonTaskProperties.name: ProxyBypassOnLocal
commonTaskProperties.help: Bypass proxy for local connections. Requires explicit proxy (`--proxy` or config setting).

commonTaskProperties.name: LogFile
commonTaskProperties.help: Log File to output to in addition to regular loggers.

authentication.name: User
authentication.help: Used with authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty.

authentication.name: Password
authentication.help: The user's password to the source. Defaults to empty.

authentication.name: ClientCertificate
authentication.help: PFX pathname for an x509 authenticated feeds. Defaults to empty.

authentication.name: CertificatePassword
authentication.help: The client certificate's password to the source. Defaults to empty.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Filter
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Search filter.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Source
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Source location for install. Can use special 'webpi' or 'windowsfeatures' sources. Defaults to sources.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: LocalOnly
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only search against local machine items.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: IdOnly
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return Package Ids in the list results.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Prerelease
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Include Prereleases? Defaults to false.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: IncludePrograms
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Used in conjunction with LocalOnly, filters out apps chocolatey has listed as packages and includes those in the list. Defaults to false.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: AllVersions
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Include results from all versions.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Version
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Specific version of a package to return.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Page
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: The 'page' of results to return. Defaults to return all results.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: PageSize
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: The amount of package results to return per page. Defaults to 25.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Exact
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages with this exact name.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: ByIdOnly
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages where the id contains the search filter.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: ByTagOnly
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages where the search filter matches on the tags.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: IdStartsWith
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages where the id starts with the search filter.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: OrderByPopularity
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Sort by package results by popularity.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: ApprovedOnly
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return approved packages - this option will filter out results not from the community repository.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: DownloadCacheAvailable
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages that have a download cache available - this option will filter out results not from the community repository.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: NotBroken
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Only return packages that are not failing testing - this option only filters out failing results from the community feed. It willnot filter against other sources.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: Detailed
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Alias for verbose.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: DisablePackageRepositoryOptimizations
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Do not use optimizations for reducing bandwidth with repository queries during package install/upgrade/outdated operations. Should not generally be used, unless a repository needs to support older methods of query. When disabled, this makes queries similar to the way they were done in Chocolatey v0.10.11 and before. Overrides the default feature 'usePackageRepositoryOptimizations' set to 'True'.

searchAndListAndFindProperties.name: ShowAuditInformation
searchAndListAndFindProperties.help: Display auditing information for a package.
